discussion.content: B and C are 100% wrong for sure

The two products that allow access to personal workflows are:

A. Power Automate: This product provides a platform to create and manage workflows that can automate tasks across multiple applications and services in Microsoft 365. Managers can use Power Automate to access personal workflows and approve requests.

D. Microsoft Teams: This product provides a collaborative workspace for teams to work together and communicate. Managers can use Microsoft Teams to access personal workflows and approve requests.

Therefore, the correct answers are A. Power Automate and D. Microsoft Teams.

Selected Answer: AD
correct answer

questions.question_text:
A company deploys Windows 10 to all devices.
Feature updates to Windows as a service must be installed as frequently as possible.
Which Windows 10 service channel installs updates most frequently?

comments.content:
They seem to have changed it to annual (instead of semi annual)
"Feature updates: Released annually. Feature updates add new features and functionality to Windows 10. Because they are delivered frequently (rather than every 3-5 years), they are easier to manage."

discussion.content: NO.....Windows Insider is not for normal users is just a test for IT admin or dept!! so the semi-annual update is the one with completely stable and secure one for productivity purposes

Selected Answer: A
question is: Which Windows 10 service channel installs updates most frequently?
My answer is : A 
Insider Program receives Feature Updates almost weekly, sometimes even multiple times a week. Other channels are limited to twice a year.
on 4/23/24 exam
Although A is correct would you really set this channel in production ? Trick question ?

Selected Answer: A
WIndows insider Program is the channel that get the most feature updates.

The Windows Insider Program is a community of millions of Windows' biggest fans who get to preview Windows features. While previewing Windows, Insiders can provide feedback and engage directly with Microsoft engineers to help shape the future of Windows.

Regardless if it is smart to set all your computers in the windows insider program, it is the channel that get the most feature updates.
This is purposefully trying to trick you. Semi-Annual Channel is only for Windows SERVER, not Windows 10 features. The only viable option is A since General Availability isnt there.
I think the scenario provided before the actual question was just to throw off the test taker. The question was asked in general form on purpose so as the confirm the reader is paying attention.
C for me

Since this is specific to Windows as a service, I believe the below is the most relevant.

From: Overview of Windows as a service
(https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/update/waas-overview)

"There are three servicing channels, each of which provides different levels of flexibility over when these updates are delivered to client computers. For more information, see Servicing channels.

There are currently three release channels for Windows clients:

The General Availability Channel receives feature updates as soon as they are available.
The Long-Term Servicing Channel, which is designed to be used only for specialized devices (which typically don't run Office) such as those that control medical equipment or ATM machines, receives new feature releases every two to three years.
The Windows Insider Program provides organizations with the opportunity to test and provide feedback on features that will be shipped in the next feature update."

C is not even an option, which makes me think it has to be A

comments.content: They seem to have forgotten to add the option "General Availability Channel"

discussion.content: this was on my exam

comments.content: Hi Kyle, are the choices from real exam same and you got the correct answered too?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
This should be C.
C should be the correct answer.
C está correta

A
Windows Insider
For many IT pros, gaining visibility into feature updates early--before they’re available to the General Availability Channel — can be both intriguing and valuable for future end user communications as well as provide the means to test for any issues on the next General Availability release. Windows Insiders can consume and deploy preproduction code to their test machines, gaining early visibility into the next build. Testing the early builds helps both Microsoft and its customers because they have the opportunity to discover possible issues before the update is ever publicly available and can report it to Microsoft.
Answer C, for me

Long-term Servicing Channel:
Specialized systems—such as devices that control medical equipment, point-of-sale systems, and ATMs—often require a longer servicing option because of their purpose. These devices typically perform a single important task and don’t need feature updates as frequently as other devices in the organization.

Semi-Annual Servicing channel:
The Semi-Annual Channel receives feature updates twice per year.

Windows Insider:
For many IT pros, gaining visibility into feature updates early--before they’re available to the Semi-Annual Channel — can be both intriguing and valuable for future end user communications as well as provide the means to test for any issues on the next General Availability release.
Answer must be C.

https://blogs.windows.com/windows-insider/2015/03/09/frequency-and-predictability-of-builds-for-windows-insiders/

Microsoft does not commit a date on Windows Insider... could not be as often as Semi-annual.

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/update/waas-overview:
"For many IT pros, gaining visibility into feature updates early—before they’re available to the Semi-Annual Channel — can be both intriguing and valuable for future end user communications as well as provide the means to test for any issues on the next Semi-Annual Channel release. With Windows 10, feature flighting enables Windows Insiders to consume and deploy preproduction code to their test machines, gaining early visibility into the next build. Testing the early builds of Windows 10 helps both Microsoft and its customers because they have the opportunity to discover possible issues before the update is ever publicly available and can report it to Microsoft."

Answer is A

In the Semi-annual Channel, feature updates are available as soon as Microsoft releases them, twice per year. So, answer must be C.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/deployment/update/get-started-updates-channels-tools
In the Semi-annual Channel, feature updates are available as soon as Microsoft releases them, twice per year. So, answer must be C.
Windows Insider provide a testing opportunity for the IT department before the updates are release, ..... C is a good answer

comments.content: I'd go for Semi Annual channel as well. You do not want Windows to break on a production environment
I mean, Windows Insider Program Servicing channel is like, ALL THE TIME

questions.question_text:
A company uses Microsoft 365.
The company wants to provide workflows of business tasks that connect to Microsoft Outlook and Microsoft Teams.
You need to choose a solution that meets the requirement.
Which solution should you choose?

discussion.content:
https://flow.microsoft.com/en-us/:
"Connect workflows to hundreds of data sources using a library of connectors and Microsoft Dataverse"
You'll find Teams and Outlook so answer is A
on 4/23/24 exam

The solution that meets the requirement is A. Power Automate.

Power Automate (formerly known as Microsoft Flow) is a cloud-based service that allows users to create automated workflows between different apps and services, including Microsoft Outlook and Microsoft Teams. With Power Automate, users can create workflows that automatically trigger actions in response to specific events, such as sending an email when a new task is added to Microsoft Planner or posting a message to a Teams channel when a new email is received in Outlook.

comments.content:
Microsoft Bookings is an app that allows users to create and manage appointment bookings, 

Microsoft Planner is a task management tool that allows users to create and track tasks. 

Power BI is a business analytics service that allows users to visualize and analyze data from a variety of sources. 

While these tools may be useful in a Microsoft 365 environment, they do not provide the specific functionality of creating workflows that connect to Microsoft Outlook and Microsoft Teams like Power Automate does.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Should be A. Power Automate is the new name for MS Flows per Q#117
A is the answer for sure
this was on my exam

Selected Answer: A
ANSWER A
Power Automate is the new name for Microsoft Flow. So the answer should be A.

You need to identify the different features of MyAnalytics and Workspace Analytics.
Which of the following are features of MyAnalytics? (Choose all that apply.)

discussion.content:
Answer is D. 
Myanalytics is a part of Enterprise E5 plan, or can be purchased as an add-on to other plans at $4 a month.
Reference : https://www.google.com/amp/s/searchcontentmanagement.techtarget.com/definition/Microsoft-MyAnalytics%3famp=1

Answer is A! MyAnalytics does not provide employee work and collaboration metrics. MyAnalytics is pure individual based. So only viable answer here is A. Other answers suggest teamwork metrics. Workplace Analytics is for collaboration between employees.

Selected Answer: B
MyAnalytics—the fitness tracker for work—will be available to everyone using Office 365 and Microsoft 365 Enterprise and Business suites that include Exchange Online. Previously, MyAnalytics was only available with an Enterprise E5 plan or as an add-on to E1 and E3 plans.

after reading a lot of references, I think A and D are correct ...u must have a license to use it also my analytical is to help employees!!
MyAnalytics (Full) and Insights by MyAnalytics - Microsoft 365 E5 with or without Audio Conferencing, Office 365 Enterprise or Nonprofit E5, or Microsoft 365 or Office 365 G5

MyAnalytics (Full) - Microsoft 365 A5 for faculty and students or Office 365 A5 for faculty and students

Insights by MyAnalytics - Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 Business, Microsoft 365 A3 for faculty and students, Office 365 E3, Office 365 E1, Office 365 A3 for faculty and students, Office 365 E3 Developer, Office 365 G3, Business Premium, or Business Essentials

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/viva/insights/personal/overview/plans-environments

comments.content:
A. Wrong 
MyAnalytics is typically included as part of Microsoft 365 subscriptions like Office 365 E5 or Microsoft 365 Enterprise plans. It may require additional licensing for some advanced features, but it's not limited to "added reference-on licenses."

The correct answer is B and D
B and D are the correct features of MyAnalytics. MyAnalytics offers insights into both individual and team work habits and collaboration metrics.
MyAnalytics provides insights into personal productivity, work habits, and collaboration patterns, including data on how time is spent in meetings, emails, and focus time. It helps individuals understand how they are collaborating with colleagues and how they can improve their work habits.

discussion.content: D. It provides employee work and collaboration metrics: MyAnalytics offers insights into how individuals spend their time, including metrics on meetings, emails, focus time, and collaboration with colleagues.
